description: Places TXT record for domain verification and DKIM records to authenticate email sent by Brevo on behalf of the user
variableDescription: The variable %verfication_code% represents a combination of prefix string and a MD5 hash. %dkim_host% is the host where DKIM key will be placed. %code_host% is the host where %verfication_code% will be placed. %dmarc_host% is the host where DMARC record will be placed. %dkim_public_key% is the DKIM public key. %dmarc_value% is dmarc value. %dkimcname% is cname value where DKIM will point
